title: 8.8 acres bare land for sale in Homagama
details:
Dear Sir / Madam.

The property located at Kiriwattuduwa at Homagama

8.8 acres of bare land.

high residential area. ideal for any preject. 20 foot road access. close to Homagama industrial zone

Idea for a hotel, cabanas, meditation center, International school or any other project.

price 120,000/- perch. negotiate

please call for more details

regards
Dilan
